switches.name: altsplit
switches.description: Alternate BSP tree splitting weights (should give more fps)

switches.name: celshader
switches.description:
Sets a global cel shader name
<shadername>

switches.name: custinfoparms
switches.description: Use custom surface parms definitions from custinfoparms.txt script

switches.name: deep
switches.description: Use detail brushes in the BSP tree, but at lowest priority (should give more fps)

switches.name: de
switches.description:
Distance epsilon for plane snapping etc.
<F>

switches.name: fakemap
switches.description: Write fakemap.map containing all world brushes

switches.name: flares
switches.description: Turn on support for flares (TEST?)

switches.name: flat
switches.description: Enable flat shading (good for combining with -celshader)

switches.name: fulldetail
switches.description: Treat detail brushes as structural ones

switches.name: keeplights
switches.description: Keep light entities in the BSP file after compile

switches.name: leaktest
switches.description: Abort if a leak was found

switches.name: meta
switches.description: Combine adjacent triangles of the same texture to surfaces (ALWAYS USE THIS)

switches.name: minsamplesize
switches.description:
Sets minimum lightmap resolution in luxels/qu
<N>

switches.name: mi
switches.description:
Sets the maximum number of indexes per surface
<N>

switches.name: mv
switches.description:
Sets the maximum number of vertices of a lightmapped surface
<N>

switches.name: ne
switches.description:
Normal epsilon for plane snapping etc.
<F>

switches.name: nocurves
switches.description: Turn off support for patches

switches.name: nodetail
switches.description: Leave out detail brushes

switches.name: noflares
switches.description: Turn off support for flares

switches.name: nofog
switches.description: Turn off support for fog volumes

switches.name: nohint
switches.description: Turn off support for hint brushes

switches.name: nosubdivide
switches.description: Turn off support for `q3map_tessSize` (breaks water vertex deforms)

switches.name: notjunc
switches.description: Do not fix T-junctions (causes cracks between triangles, do not use)

switches.name: nowater
switches.description: Turn off support for water, slime or lava (Stef, this is for you)

switches.name: np
switches.description:
Force all surfaces to be nonplanar with a given shade angle
<A>

switches.name: onlyents
switches.description: Only update entities in the BSP

switches.name: patchmeta
switches.description: Turn patches into triangle meshes for display

switches.name: rename
switches.description: Append suffix to miscmodel shaders (needed for SoF2)
switches.label: fix model names

switches.name: samplesize
switches.description:
Sets default lightmap resolution in luxels/qu
<N>

switches.name: skyfix
switches.description: Turn sky box into six surfaces to work around ATI problems

switches.name: snap
switches.description:
Snap brush bevel planes to the given number of units
<N>

switches.name: texrange
switches.description:
Limit per-surface texture range to the given number of units, and subdivide surfaces like with `q3map_tessSize` if this is not met
<N>

switches.name: verboseentities
switches.description: Enable `-v` only for map entities, not for the world

switches.name: debuginset
switches.description: Push all triangle vertexes towards the triangle center

switches.name: debugportals
switches.description: Make BSP portals visible in the map

switches.name: debugsurfaces
switches.description: Color the vertexes according to the index of the surface

switches.name: fast
switches.description: Only calculates rough visibility data. Quick and dirty, not actually useful for VIS purposes.

switches.name: hint
switches.description: Will merge the bsp leaves (except for hint portals) before calculating the visiblity list.

switches.name: merge
switches.description: Will merge the bsp leaves before calculating the visibility list.

switches.name: nopassage
switches.description: Disables the passage visiblity algorithm. Passage VIS is a bit faster and tighter than the old algorithm.

switches.name: nosort
switches.description: Disables the sorting of portals by complexity. Sorting speeds up visiblity calculations.

switches.name: passageOnly
switches.description: Will use the passage visibility algorithm only.

switches.name: saveprt
switches.description: Disables the automatic deletion of the .prt portal file after VIS finishes.

switches.name: v
switches.description: Enables verbose mode. Always use this.

switches.name: approx
switches.description:
Vertex light approximation tolerance (never use in conjunction with deluxemapping)
<N>

switches.name: areascale
switches.description:
Scaling factor for area lights (surfacelight)
<F>

switches.name: border
switches.description: Add a red border to lightmaps for debugging

switches.name: bouncegrid
switches.description: Also compute radiosity on the light grid

switches.name: bounceonly
switches.description: Only compute radiosity

switches.name: bouncescale
switches.description:
Scaling factor for radiosity
<F>

switches.name: bounce
switches.description:
Number of bounces for radiosity
<N>

switches.name: cheapgrid
switches.description: Use `-cheap` style lighting for radiosity

switches.name: cheap
switches.description: Abort vertex light calculations when white is reached

switches.name: compensate
switches.description:
Lightmap compensate (darkening factor applied after everything else)
<F>

switches.name: cpma
switches.description: CPMA vertex lighting mode

switches.name: custinfoparms
switches.description: Read scripts/custinfoparms.txt

switches.name: dark
switches.description: Darken lightmap seams

switches.name: deluxemode
switches.description:
Sets deluxemapping mode:
0 = modelspace deluxemaps (default)
1 = tangentspace deluxemaps
<N>

switches.name: deluxe
switches.description: Enable deluxemapping (light direction maps)

switches.name: dirtdebug
switches.description: Store the dirtmaps as lightmaps for debugging

switches.name: dirtdepth
switches.description: Dirtmapping depth

switches.name: dirtgain
switches.description: Dirtmapping exponent

switches.name: dirtmode
switches.description:
Sets dirtmapping mode:
0 = Ordered direction (default)
1 = Randomized direction
<N>

switches.name: dirtscale
switches.description: Dirtmapping scaling factor

switches.name: dirty
switches.description: Enable dirtmapping

switches.name: dump
switches.description: Dump radiosity from `-bounce` into numbered MAP file prefabs

switches.name: export
switches.description: Export lightmaps when compile finished (like `-export` mode)

switches.name: exposure
switches.description:
Lightmap exposure to better support overbright spots
<F>

switches.name: external
switches.description: Force external lightmaps even if at size of internal lightmaps

switches.name: extravisnudge
switches.description: Broken feature to nudge the luxel origin to a better vis cluster

switches.name: extrawide
switches.description: Deprecated alias for `-super 2 -filter`

switches.name: extra
switches.description: Deprecated alias for `-super 2`

switches.name: fastallocate
switches.description: Use `-fastallocate` to trade lightmap size against allocation time (useful with hi res lightmaps on large maps: reduce allocation time from days to minutes for only some extra bytes)

switches.name: fastbounce
switches.description: Use `-fast` style lighting for radiosity

switches.name: faster
switches.description: Use a faster falloff curve for lighting; also implies `-fast`

switches.name: fastgrid
switches.description: Use `-fast` style lighting for the light grid

switches.name: fast
switches.description: Ignore tiny light contributions

switches.name: filter
switches.description: Lightmap filtering

switches.name: floodlight
switches.description: Enable floodlight (zero-effort somewhat decent lighting)

switches.name: gamma
switches.description:
Lightmap gamma
<F>

switches.name: gridambientscale
switches.description:
Scaling factor for the light grid ambient components only
<F>

switches.name: gridscale
switches.description:
Scaling factor for the light grid only
<F>

switches.name: lightmapsize
switches.description:
Size of lightmaps to generate (must be a power of two)
<N>

switches.name: lightsubdiv
switches.description:
Size of light emitting shader subdivision
<N>

switches.name: lomem
switches.description: Low memory but slower lighting mode

switches.name: lowquality
switches.description: Low quality floodlight (appears to currently break floodlight)

switches.name: minsamplesize
switches.description:
Sets minimum lightmap resolution in luxels/qu
<N>

switches.name: nocollapse
switches.description: Do not collapse identical lightmaps

switches.name: nodeluxe
switches.description: Disable deluxemapping

switches.name: nogrid
switches.description: Disable grid light calculation (makes all entities fullbright)

switches.name: nolightmapsearch
switches.description: Do not optimize lightmap packing for GPU memory usage (as doing so costs fps)

switches.name: normalmap
switches.description: Color the lightmaps according to the direction of the surface normal (TODO is this identical to `-debugnormals`?)

switches.name: nostyle
switches.description: Disable support for light styles

switches.name: nosurf
switches.description: Disable tracing against surfaces (only uses BSP nodes then)

switches.name: notrace
switches.description: Disable shadow occlusion

switches.name: novertex
switches.description: Disable vertex lighting

switches.name: patchshadows
switches.description: Cast shadows from patches

switches.name: pointscale
switches.description:
Scaling factor for point lights (light entities)
<F>

switches.name: q3
switches.description: Use nonlinear falloff curve by default (like Q3A)

switches.name: samplescale
switches.description:
Scales all lightmap resolutions
<F>

switches.name: samplesize
switches.description:
Sets default lightmap resolution in luxels/qu
<N>

switches.name: samples
switches.description:
Adaptive supersampling quality
<N>

switches.name: scale
switches.description:
Scaling factor for all light types
<F>

switches.name: shadeangle
switches.description:
Angle for phong shading
<F>

switches.name: shade
switches.description: Enable phong shading at default shade angle

switches.name: skyscale
switches.description:
Scaling factor for sky and sun light
<F>

switches.name: smooth
switches.description: Deprecated alias for `-samples 2`

switches.name: style
switches.description: Enable support for light styles

switches.name: sunonly
switches.description: Only compute sun light

switches.name: super
switches.description:
Ordered grid supersampling quality
<N>

switches.name: thresh
switches.description:
Triangle subdivision threshold
<F>

switches.name: trianglecheck
switches.description: Broken check that should ensure luxels apply to the right triangle

switches.name: trisoup
switches.description: Convert brush faces to triangle soup

switches.name: wolf
switches.description: Use linear falloff curve by default (like W:ET)

switches.name: nofloodlight
switches.description: Disables floodlighting.

switches.name: nofloodstyles
switches.description: Floodlighting disabled for styled lightmaps.

switches.name: debugaxis
switches.description: Color the lightmaps according to the lightmap axis

switches.name: debugcluster
switches.description: Color the lightmaps according to the index of the cluster

switches.name: debugdeluxe
switches.description: Show deluxemaps on the lightmap

switches.name: debugnormals
switches.description: Color the lightmaps according to the direction of the surface normal

switches.name: debugorigin
switches.description: Color the lightmaps according to the origin of the luxels

switches.name: debugsurfaces
switches.description: Color the lightmaps according to the index of the surface

switches.name: debugunused
switches.description: This option does nothing

switches.name: debug
switches.description: Mark the lightmaps according to the cluster: unmapped clusters get yellow, occluded ones get pink, flooded ones get blue overlay color, otherwise red
